name: Coldfront
description:
Hello player, welcome to Coldfront, an adventure game created using ChatGPT, DALL-E and Midjourney that will take you to a distant alien planet called "Frostbite".

In this world, a part of the planet remains always in the shade and it's called "Cold Side". This area is rich in precious minerals and several companies are trying to take possession of it, including the powerful "Niraxus Mining Corp" which wants to use these minerals for its own profit.

You will play the role of a former employee of this company who, after discovering the devastating effects their activity is causing to the planet, decides to join the rebel forces to drive away the invaders and restore contact with nature.

Your mission will be to uncover the secrets of the planet, gather information, ally yourself with the forces of the planet and fight against the company to take back control of the Cold Side and save Frostbite from destruction.
